component.name: Speech Note
component.summary: Note taking and reading with Speech to Text and Text to Speech

description.p: Speech Note enables you to take and read notes with your voice with multiple languages. It uses Speech to Text and Text to Speech conversions to do so. All voice processing is entirely done off-line, locally on your computer without the use of a network connection. Your privacy is always respected. No data is sent to the Internet.

ul.li: New Piper TTS models for Chinese

Whisper STT models enabled also for: Amharic, Arabic, Bengali, Danish, Estonian, Basque, Persian, Hindi, Croatian, Hungarian, Icelandic, Georgian, Kazakh, Korean, Lithuanian, Latvian, Mongolian, Maltese, Nepali, Romanian, Slovak, Slovenian, Albanian, Swahili, Tagalog, Tatar, Uzbek and Yoruba
Whisper fine-tuned STT models for: Czech, Slovak, Slovenian, Romanian, Russian, Hungarian and Polish
New Piper TTS models for: Icelandic, Swedish and Russian
Fix: Whisper STT didn't work for Chinese language
New DeepSpeech STT model for Latvain language
Fix: Crash during TTS on some systems
Fix: Downloaded models disappeared after app restart when Downloads directory was not set in the system
